requirement.ratioDescription: 15% apprentice labor hours on public works projects over $2 million
exemptions: Good faith effort compliance (if unable to meet 15%)
requirement.notes: Washington uses a utilization percentage rather than a fixed ratio. Applies to all public works contracts over $2M. Contractors must submit apprentice utilization reports.
requirement.penaltyDescription: Penalty of 2% of contract amount for non-compliance
requirement.enforcementAgency: Washington State Department of Labor & Industries

iraFederalRequirement.ratioDescription: 15% apprentice labor hours on IRA/IIJA-funded clean energy projects over $1 million
iraFederalRequirement.notes: Federal requirement for enhanced clean energy tax credits. Applies nationwide regardless of state law. Began 2023, percentage increases over time.
